metadata.description: Provide a prefix (max 10 characters, unique at tenant-scope) for the Management Group hierarchy and other resources created as part of Enterprise-scale.
Provide the subscription id of an existing, empty subscription you want to dedicate for management. If you don't want to bring a subscription, leave this parameter empty as is.
Provide the subscription id of an existing, empty subscription you want to dedicate for networking.
Provide the subscription id of an existing, empty subscription you want to dedicate for identity.
Provide the subscription ids for existing, empty subscriptions you want to move in as your first online landing zones.
Provide the subscription ids for existing, empty subscriptions you want to move in as your first corp landing zones.
Provide the location identifier prefix (3 characters)
Provide the PLatform Management Subscription identifier prefix (4 characters)
Provide the PLatform Identity Subscription identifier prefix (4 characters)
Provide the PLatform Connectivity Subscription identifier prefix (4 characters)
Provide the resource group identifier
Provide the log analytics identifier prefix
Provide the Azure Automation identifier prefix
Provide the Azure Key Vault identifier prefix
Provide the Azure Recovery Services Vault identifier prefix
Provide the Azure Storage identifier prefix
Provide the Azure ddos Protection prefix
Provide the virtual network gateway identifier prefix
Provide the virtual network identifier prefix
Provide the public IP identifier prefix
Provide the Azure Firewall identifier prefix
Provide the Azure Firewall Policy identifier prefix

If 'Yes' is selected when also adding a subscription for management, ARM will assign two policies to enable auditing in your environment, into the Log Analytics workspace for platform monitoring. If 'No', it will be ignored.

If 'Yes' is selected when also adding a subscription for management, ARM will assign two policies to enable auditing in your environment, into the Log Analytics workspace for platform monitoring. If 'No', it will be ignored.
Email address for Azure Security Center contact details.
If 'Yes' is selected, policy will be assigned to enforce VM monitoring.
If 'Yes' is selected, policy will be assigned to enforce VMSS monitoring.
If 'Yes' is selected then an Azure Storage Account will be deployed.

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of the Management Group structure
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').mg.mgmtGroups]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Azure Policy Definitions at the Customer Root Management Group
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').mg.policyDefinitions]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Azure Policy Set Definitions at the root Management Group to prevent usage of public endpoints for PaaS services
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').mg.publicEndpointPolicyDefinition]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Azure Policy Set Definitions at the root Management Group to deploy Private DNS Zones for PaaS services
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').mg.privateDnsPolicyDefinition]

resources.comments: Delay Counter
resources.name: [concat('preparingToLaunch', copyIndex())]

resources.comments: Move the Subscription to the appropriate Management Group or skip if not used. (Platform Management Subscription)
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').mg.moveManagementSubscription]

resources.comments: Move the Subscription to the appropriate Management Group or skip if not used. (Platform Connectivity Subscription)
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').mg.moveConnectivitySubscription]

resources.comments: Move the Subscription to the appropriate Management Group or skip if not used. (Platform Identity Subscription)
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').mg.moveIdentitySubscription]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of a Log Analytics Workspace and Automation account in the Platform Management Subscription
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').sub.monitoring]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Log Analytics Solutions in the Platform Subscription
resources.condition: [and(and(not(empty(parameters('managementSubscriptionId'))), equals(parameters('enableLogAnalytics'), 'Yes')),  equals(parameters('enableLogAnalytics'), 'Yes'), or(or(or(or(or(equals(parameters('enableSecuritySolution'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableAgentHealth'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableChangeTracking'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableUpdateMgmt'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableActivityLog'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableVmInsights'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableServiceMap'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableSqlAssessment'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableKeyVaultAnalytics'), 'Yes')))]
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').sub.monitoringSolutions]
